title: I cant download the new client
body: Everybody on the forum says delete league client.exe but i dont have that file i just have lol.launcher and lol.launcher.admin who can help me when the download is almost finished at 99% it says error try again everytime i try this is the error someone can help me bc i have a friend with who i want to play :3

replies.body: Getting stuck at 99% can indicate a connection problem.  Your patcher is trying to get you up to date, but it's backtracking to pick up missing content and failing.  Try out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and get that fixed up.  Let me know if you run into issues, though!

thx for your help i do the steps from there but a step i cant do it like almost username on windows is admin but idk my password  but i do the other ones like it sayd to update java and etc.i try to update the client on lol now to see if i will have again the same problem :D
